mapper.insert: insert into member(memberNick, memberId, memberPw, memberName, memberDate, memberTel, memberMail) values(#{memberNick},#{memberId},#{memberPw},#{memberName},#{memberDate},#{memberTel},#{memberMail})
mapper.select: select * from member where memberId = #{memberId} and memberPw = #{memberPw}
